thread.section_title: The Goring - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Understated charm, comfort, elegance and amazing consistency.
thread.title_full: Understated charm, comfort, elegance and amazing consistency. - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Steven P
title: Understated charm, comfort, elegance and amazing consistency.
text:
I have reviewed this hotel on more than one occasion and continue to have nothing but praise for it. From arrival to departure you are treated as a valued guest and a human being. The staff are friendly and approachable. There is considerable expertise to be found at the concierge's desk. The rooms are perfectly formed, considerable thought has gone into their design even when space is at a premium. The bar, lounge and dining room are all extremely pleasant places to pass an hour or four!
My wife and I have been staying here for seven years now and the last visit was our eighth, it has got better in many ways in that time but most important is the overall consistency of product. Decorations may change, some staff may come and go but as a customer you can be assured of a first class stay in considerable comfort and style. Well done The Goring, can't wait for the next visit!
Room Tip: Choose what you can afford, do not be put off by the smaller rooms. See more room tips
